ReferralProgram.title: Discover Maxup Now
ReferralProgram.description: Learn how to increase your earnings and level up!

step1.title: Copy Your Referral Link
step1.description: Start by copying your unique referral link to share it with friends and acquaintances
step1.actionText: Click to copy your personal link!

step2.title: Share the Link with Friends
step2.description: Send your referral link via WhatsApp, Twitter, or any other means. The more participants, the higher your earnings.

step3.title: Earn 0.7% on Every Purchase
step3.description: Every time one of your friends buys through your referral link, you earn 0.7% credited easily to your wallet!

step4.title: Move to the Next Level
step4.description: The guide offers you 5 levels with returns up to 0.7%

addCoupon.title: Add Coupon
